item.title: Web Development
item.description: Javascript jQuery Add jQuery through console var jq = document.createElement('script'); jq.src = "https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.4/jquery.min.js"; document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(jq); // ... give time for script to load, then type. jQuery.noConflict(); Extend jQuery $.fn.visible = function() { return this.css('visibility', 'visible'); }; $.fn.invisible = function() { return this.css('visibility', 'hidden'); }; Python Helpful command if anything behaves strangely find . -name "*.pyc" -exec rm -rf {} \; Kill Debugger import os; os.system('kill -9 %d' % os.

item.title: Documentation And Styleguides
item.description: Styleguides Python PEP 8 - Style Guide for Python Code. PEP 257 – Docstring Conventions Google Python Style Guide Django Coding style Frontend Javascript Google JavaScript Style Guide Node.js Style Guide Vue.js Style Guide HTML/CSS Google HTML/CSS Style Guide Code Guide by @mdo - Standards for developing flexible, durable, and sustainable HTML and CSS. Gamepad URL URL Structure SASS SASS Style Guide My Current CSS and Sass Styleguide Documentation Javascript JavaScript Reference JavaScript and HTML DOM Reference Python The Python Language Reference The Python Standard Library Django SASS Sass - Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

item.title: Reference Materials For Web Development And Programming
item.description: JavaScript Important ECMAScript compatibility table ES6 6 reasons Web developers need to learn JavaScript ES6 now ECMAScript 6 — New Features: Overview & Comparison What’s the difference between using “let” and “var” to declare a variable? Misc Superhero.js - A collection of the best articles, videos and presentations on “Creating, testing and maintaining a large JavaScript code base”. JavaScript: The Good Parts - Javascript presentation.

item.title: Python Modules Installation
item.description: Python Create a requirements.txt file with the following format: Django==2.0.2 mysql-python>=1.0 -e git+https://github.com/desecho/django-tqdm@1.0.3.git#egg=django-tqdm # comment Install using command: pip install -r requirements.txt --exists-action s
